data.name: SpreadsheetViewSettings
desc: contains settings which are specific to each view of a spreadsheet

properties.name: GridColor
desc: specifies the color in which the cell grid is displayed.

properties.name: HasColumnRowHeaders
desc: enables the column and row headers of the view.

properties.name: HasHorizontalScrollBar
desc: enables the horizontal scroll bar of the view.

properties.name: HasSheetTabs
desc: enables the sheet tabs of the view.

properties.name: HasVerticalScrollBar
desc: enables the vertical scroll bar of the view.

properties.name: HideSpellMarks
desc: disables the display of marks from online spelling.

properties.name: IsOutlineSymbolsSet
desc: enables the display of outline symbols.

properties.name: IsValueHighlightingEnabled
desc: controls whether strings, values, and formulas are displayed in different colors.

properties.name: ShowAnchor
desc: enables display of anchor symbols when drawing objects are selected.

properties.name: ShowCharts
desc: enables the display of charts in the view.

properties.name: ShowDrawing
desc: enables the display of drawing objects in the view.

properties.name: ShowFormulas
desc: controls whether formulas are displayed instead of their results.

properties.name: ShowGrid
desc: enables the display of the cell grid.

properties.name: ShowHelpLines
desc: enables display of help lines when moving drawing objects.

properties.name: ShowNotes
desc: controls whether a marker is shown for notes in cells.

properties.name: ShowObjects
desc: enables display of embedded objects in the view.

properties.name: ShowPageBreaks
desc: enables display of page breaks.

properties.name: ShowZeroValues
desc: enables display of zero-values.

properties.name: ZoomType
desc: This property defines the zoom type for the document.

properties.name: ZoomValue
desc: Defines the zoom value to use.
Valid only if the ZoomType is set to com.sun.star.view.DocumentZoomType.BY_VALUE.
